tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConservationMeasuresBefore (
  measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_name VARCHAR(255),
  implementation_date DATE,
  effectiveness_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationMeasuresAfter (
  measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_name VARCHAR(255),
  implementation_date DATE,
  effectiveness_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationDataBefore (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_id INT,
  observation_date DATE,
  conservation_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationDataAfter (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_id INT,
  observation_date DATE,
  conservation_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_id INT,
  before_effectiveness_score INT,
  after_effectiveness_score INT
)
